Lyrics: raakhii ke din waadaa karo waadaa nibhaaoge apanii pyaarii bahanaa kii laaj bachaaoge	bhaaii kaa bachapan maan ko mile patni ko jawaanii bahanaa kii qismat hai bidaaii kii kahaanii ashqon kii kahaanii men tum kushiyaan milaaoge bahan ko lagaa ke gale hansoge hansaaoge	raakhii ke har taar men to bahanaa kaa pyaar hai bahanaa ke pyaar men har bhaaii kii raftaar hai duniyaa kii ye riit bhaiyaa kaise tod paaoge saawan kaa din jab aayegaa khinche chale aaoge

Title: taubaa kaise hain naadaan ghungharuu paayal ke

Title: jab kabhii mudake dekhataa huun main

Lyrics: phir se aiyo badaraa bidesii tere pankhon pe motii jaduungii bhar ke jaiyo hamaarii kalaiyaa main talaiyaa ke naare miluungii tujhe mere kaale kamalii waale kii saun	tere jaane kii rut main jaanatii huun mud ke aane kii riit hai ki nahiin	ho kaalii dargaah se puuchhuungii jaake tere man men bhii priit hai ki nahiin kachchii puliyaa se hoke gujariyo	kachchii puliyaa ke naare miluungii	tuu jo ruk jaae merii atariyaa main atariyaa pe jhaalar lagaa duun daaluun chaar taabiiz gale men apane kaajal se bindiyaa lagaa duun chhuuke jaiyo hamaarii bagiichii main piipal ke aade miluungii

Title: kisii kaa naam lo benaam afasaane bahut se hain
Lyrics: kisii kaa naam lo benaam afasaane bahut se hain na jaane kisako tum kahate ho diiwaane bahut se hain	panaahen de rahii hain ajanabii naadariyaan mujhako terii mahafil men waranaa jaane pahachaane bahut se hain	bas ab so jaao niind aankhon men hai kal phir sunaayenge zaraa sii rah gaii hai raat afasaane bahut se hain	likhii hai kaak udaanii hii agar apane muqaddar men tere kuuche pe kyaa mauquuf viiraane bahut se hain	mere kahane se hogii tarkerasmoraah gairon se bajaa hai aapane kahane mere maane bahut se hain
